tasks.title: Fix login button not working on mobile Safari
tasks.description: Users report that the login button doesn't respond when tapped on iPhone Safari browser. Works fine on desktop Chrome.

aiAnalysis.reasoning: Mobile Safari's rendering engine and event handling might be causing the issue.  Debugging and CSS adjustments should resolve the problem.

tasks.title: Design new user dashboard
tasks.description: Create wireframes and mockups for the main user dashboard with charts and analytics widgets.

aiAnalysis.reasoning: Wireframing and mocking up a dashboard with charts requires design skills and iterative refinement.

tasks.title: Set up CI/CD pipeline
tasks.description: Configure automated testing and deployment pipeline using GitHub Actions for the React frontend and Node.js backend

aiAnalysis.reasoning: Setting up CI/CD for both frontend and backend requires configuring workflows, testing stages, and deployment strategies.

tasks.title: Database performance optimization
tasks.description: Query times are slow on the user analytics page. Need to add indexes and optimize the complex JOIN queries.

aiAnalysis.reasoning: Database query optimization requires indexing and refactoring complex JOINs to improve performance on the user analytics page.
